text: Jorat-Mézières is a new municipality in the district of Lavaux-Oron in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 July 2016 the former municipalities of Carrouge, Ferlens and Mézières merged to form the new municipality of Jorat- Mézières.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 27 April 2016 == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the municipality of Jorat-Mézières Category:2016 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Lavaux- Oron
title: Jorat-Mézières
